name: Delicious Dessert
ingredients: 2 boxes coconut cream pudding or instant chocolate pudding
instructions: Mix and pat in 9 x 13 pan.
Mix together and spread on cooled crust.
Cook 2 boxes coconut cream pudding with 3 cups milk.
Make first so it is cool.
Put remaining cool whip on top of 3rd layer.
To make it chocolate do all the same but layer 3 should be 2 boxes of instant chocolate pudding with 3 cups milk.
